backend/main.mo: Implements presale logic including contribution tracking, allocation updates, presale cap enforcement, and query endpoints for status and contributor data.
feature_evidence.json: Defines feature evidence entries mapping new UI features to their source files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries for all major frontend source files describing their roles in the presale app UI.
frontend/index.css: Sets Tailwind base layers and defines light/dark CSS variables for the neon color system used across the UI.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML wrapper that mounts the React application and loads the main TypeScript entry file.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React composition file that arranges all presale sections plus the new listings section and background music controller.
frontend/src/components/BackgroundMusic/: UI controller for background music that shows mute and volume controls only when audio is playing.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders the site footer with copyright text and a caffeine.ai attribution link including UTM parameters.
frontend/src/components/presale/Contribu: Fetches and aggregates contributor data and displays it in a neon-styled table with timestamps.
frontend/src/components/presale/Countdow: Displays a neon-styled 24‑hour countdown using values from the useCountdown24h hook.
frontend/src/components/presale/DepositA: Displays the presale deposit address with a button to copy it and visual feedback when copied.
frontend/src/components/presale/HeroSect: Renders the main hero section with an image, headline, tagline, and three feature cards.
frontend/src/components/presale/HowToCon: Explains how to participate in the presale with three steps and a brief info box using presale constants.
frontend/src/components/presale/PostPres: Shows post‑presale listings or loading/coming‑soon states based on presale status, using dynamic listing data.
frontend/src/components/presale/PresaleP: Displays presale progress with a bar, ICP received/remaining stats, and a completion badge when ended.
frontend/src/components/presale/PresaleS: Wraps countdown, presale parameters, progress, and deposit address into a full presale status section.
frontend/src/components/presale/Tokenomi: Presents tokenomics details and a FAQ section using constants like max supply and presale cap.
frontend/src/constants/listingsAfterPres: Defines the ListingItem interface and a list of planned post‑presale listings with titles, descriptions, and statuses.
frontend/src/constants/presale.ts: Exports presale constants including deposit address, cap, max supply, and polling interval.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackgroundMusic.ts: Provides a hook to load, control, and persist background music playback with volume, mute, and autoplay‑unblock handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useContributors.ts: Fetches contributor data from the actor using react‑query with polling.
frontend/src/hooks/useCountdown24h.ts: Implements a 24‑hour countdown timer returning hours, minutes, and seconds.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity auth context, handling login, stored identity loading, and state tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/usePresaleStatus.ts: Queries presale status from the actor with periodic polling.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, theme variables, and custom neon/animation utilities for the UI.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/utils/backgroundMusicStorag: Handles loading and saving music preferences and opt‑in flags in localStorage.
frontend/src/utils/contributors.ts: Aggregates contributor entries by address, summing amounts and sorting by latest timestamp.
frontend/src/utils/format.ts: Formats numbers with German‑style dot thousand separators.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, animations, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Holds the project’s current state, including high‑level goals for an ICP‑based presale site, architectural notes for ledger integration and UI behavior, known issues, and a list of implemented features. Serves as the master specification guiding design, functionality, and pending fixes.
